channel.title: Chats with James Podcast
channel.description:
Chats with James is a podcast discussing everything that James or his guests are passionate about.
Embedded Systems, the Rust Programming Language, and a variety of other technical topics are the most commonly discussed items.
New episodes are released every Tuesday.
channel.itunes:author: James Munns
channel.itunes:subtitle: James Munns talks to guests about things they are passionate about
channel.itunes:summary:
Chats with James is a podcast discussing everything that James or his guests are passionate about.
Embedded Systems, the Rust Programming Language, and a variety of other technical topics are the most commonly discussed items.
New episodes are released every Tuesday.

item.title: 003 - Michael Gattozzi
item.description: James chats with Michael Gattozzi to discuss developer tooling, message serialization, and undefined behavior in Rust.
item.author: contact@onevariable.com
item.itunes:author: James Munns
item.itunes:subtitle: James chats with Michael Gattozzi
item.itunes:summary: James chats with Michael Gattozzi to discuss developer tooling, message serialization, and undefined behavior in Rust.

item.title: 002 - Christopher Hunt
item.description: James chats with Christopher Hunt to discuss programming languages, the cost of software abstraction, Bluetooth, and state machines.
item.author: contact@onevariable.com
item.itunes:author: James Munns
item.itunes:subtitle: James chats with Christopher Hunt
item.itunes:summary: James chats with Christopher Hunt to discuss programming languages, the cost of software abstraction, Bluetooth, and state machines.

item.title: 001 - Lachezar Lechev
item.description: James chats with Lachezar Lechev to discuss Rust in Avionics, drone simulation technologies, and burnout in software development.
item.author: contact@onevariable.com
item.itunes:author: James Munns
item.itunes:subtitle: James chats with Lachezar Lechev
